channel.title: Need Tele Panel Code - Explained in Post
channel.description:
ok, well, i got this idea to make a tele panel for people to get around easier with. it would be something like the mage menu, but with just tele buttons. except, i'm new at coding, and i dont know how to! so, if someone could get me the code for 1, that would be AWESOME! the coordinates i can change for my preference, so u dont have to go thru that trouble. but just a code and some explanation on where to put it and stuff would be cool :D
Working on my own server. pimpscape source.
thanks!

item.title: Need Tele Panel Code - Explained in Post
item.dc:creator: @Twisted_Fun Twisted Fun
item.description:
@Twisted_Fun wrote:

alright, ill fix it…if i can figure it out…lemme see…[br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2007, 06:51:36 PM[/size][hr]i found and fixed the problem…[br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2007, 07:00:04 PM[/size][hr]

it was the 2nd post of codes u put up. with the sendQuest stuff in it. i think it said to make all values less then 8000 to pop up or somethin…wtver, its good now. now i just gotta make it stop teleing me there every 3 seconds. though im not telling it to…

Read full topic

to refresh them back to the normal txt just restart the client

item.title: Need Tele Panel Code - Explained in Post
item.dc:creator: @Palidino76 Palidino76
item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

write a command such as this for opening interfaces:

	if (command.startsWith("frame") && playerRights >= 2) {
	try {
	int frameID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6));
             showInterface(frameID);
	} catch(Exception e) {
	sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::frame #");
	}
    	}

and under your welcome to message:

		try {
		for (int i = 0; i < 8000; i++) {
	             sendQuest(":"+i+":", i);
		}
		} catch(Exception E) {}

thatll change all txt to the id, so u can change the txt

now just click the buttons on the interface and look at ur server.bat or whatever and itll show the button, and under case i think 85 add this:

case #:
teleportToX = #;
teleportToY = #;
sendMessage("You teleport to SOMEWHERE!!);
break;

Read full topic
